footer.copyright: Â© {{year}} K6 Commander. All rights reserved.

form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure a new test run. Select the test suites and parameters below.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the endpoint or page you want to test.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select one or more test suites to run against the target URL.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic with k6 to measure backend performance.
form.lighthouseSwitchDescription: Analyze page quality for performance, SEO, and accessibility.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Perform a deep technical SEO analysis with AI recommendations.
form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request details for the k6 load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Select a pre-configured profile or define a custom one.
form.customProfileDescription: Manually set VUs, duration, and ramping stages.
form.stagesDescription: Define the ramping pattern for VUs over time.

error.atLeastOne: You must select at least one test suite to run.

toast.testStartedDescription: Your test run is underway. You will be taken to the results page upon completion.
toast.historyClearedDescription: Your local test history has been cleared.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Existing History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: Starting a new test can clear your existing local test history to save space. Do you want to clear it before running this new test?

running.title: Test in Progress...
running.description: Please wait while the tests are being executed. This may take several minutes depending on the configuration.

summary.title: Test Run Complete
summary.description: Results for the test run against {{url}} are summarized below.
summary.noK6Data: k6 load test was not run.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Review, re-run, or load results from your past test runs.
history.noHistoryDescription: Run a new test from the main page to see its results here.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been saved to a JSON file.
toast.exportFailDescription: There was an error exporting your history.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Your test history has been successfully loaded.
toast.importFailDescription: The selected file could not be parsed.
toast.importInvalidFormat: The imported file has an invalid format.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: All test runs have been removed from your history.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you sure?
clearAllDialog.description: This will permanently delete all of your test history. This action cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Test Run?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete this test run from your history.

about.title: The Ultimate Local-First Testing Suite
about.description: K6 Commander is a lightweight, local-first, authorized load-testing platform. It allows you to configure, run, and analyze load tests, Lighthouse audits, and basic SEO checks directly from a sleek web UI, leveraging the power of k6, InfluxDB, and Grafana.
about.localFirstDescription: All your test data, configurations, and history are stored securely in your browser's local storage. Nothing is sent to the cloud.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: Combine backend load testing (k6), frontend auditing (Lighthouse), and SEO analysis into a single, cohesive workflow.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Go beyond simple API calls. Simulate real-world traffic patterns to find performance bottlenecks before your users do.
about.k6HowItWorks: The UI configures a k6 script, which is executed in a dedicated Docker container. Metrics are pushed in real-time to a local InfluxDB instance.
about.k6HowItWorks2: A live Grafana dashboard visualizes these metrics, giving you immediate insight into RPS, latency, and error rates.
about.lighthouseFeatureDescription: Run Google's industry-standard audits to ensure your site is fast, accessible, and follows best practices.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: The backend spawns a headless Chrome instance and runs Lighthouse against your URL, generating a comprehensive JSON and HTML report.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: We parse the JSON to display a high-level summary in the UI, with a link to the full, interactive HTML report for deep dives.
about.seoFeatureDescription: Check critical on-page SEO factors and get intelligent, actionable recommendations for improvement.
about.seoHowItWorks: The system fetches your page's raw HTML and sends it to a Genkit AI flow running on Google's Gemini model.
about.seoHowItWorks2: The AI analyzes elements like title tags, meta descriptions, and canonicals, providing a status and a tailored recommendation for any issues it finds.
about.involvedDescription: K6 Commander is open source. Contributions, bug reports, and feature requests are welcome!

tour.step1: Start by entering the full URL of the web page or API endpoint you want to test.
tour.step2: Next, choose which tests you want to run. You can select one or more.
tour.step3: If you're running a load test, select a preset profile or create a custom one to define the traffic pattern.
tour.step4: When you're ready, click here to start the test. You'll be taken to a new screen to monitor its progress.

apiTester.newCollectionDescription: Create a new collection to organize your API requests.

deleteCollectionDialog.title: Delete Collection?
deleteCollectionDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{name}}' collection and all of its requests? This action cannot be undone.

toast.cannotDeleteDefault: The default 'Scratch Pad' collection cannot be deleted.
toast.curlImportErrorDescription: Could not parse the provided cURL command. Please check the format.
toast.curlImportSuccessDescription: The request has been loaded from the cURL command.
toast.apiCurlCopiedDescription: API request copied to your clipboard as a cURL command.
toast.curlCopyErrorDescription: Could not generate or copy the cURL command.
toast.curlCopyInvalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL before copying as cURL.
toast.jsonFormatErrorDescription: The text in the body is not valid JSON and could not be formatted.

deleteRequestDialog.title: Delete Request?
deleteRequestDialog.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this request from your history?

apiTester.noRequestsDescription: Your sent requests will appear here.

importCurlDialog.title: Import from cURL
importCurlDialog.description: Paste a cURL command below to import it as a request.

apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to see the response here.
